description: Harry Beautyman's equaliser earns Woking a 2-2 draw at play-off chasing Southend United.
title: Southend United 2-2 Woking
title_page: Southend United 2-2 Woking: Harry Beautyman's equaliser earns visitors a point - BBC Sport
maintext:
Southend dropped two points in their push for a play-off place in the National League as they were held 2-2 by Woking at Roots Hall.
Harry Beautyman's equaliser ensured the visitors left with a draw after the Shrimpers had battled back from behind to lead.
Chinwike Okoli opened the scoring for Woking with a stunning volley after just five minutes but James Golding levelled before the break.
A ferocious strike from Gus Scott-Morriss, his 15th goal of the season, put Southend ahead on 64 minutes but Beautyman's solo effort four minutes later secured a point.
